pageTitle: Meet our representatives across the UK - Visit Kent - University of Kent
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {5900=Last Updated: 22/01/2015, 5774=The University of Kent, Canterbury, Kent, CT2 7NZ, T: +44 (0)1227 764000, 7975=The University of Kent, Canterbury, Kent, CT2 7NZ, T +44 (0)1227 764000}
textBeforeTable: The University of Kent will be present at the following education conventions in 2015: Exhibitors are drawn from almost all universities and colleges offering higher education courses, as well as further education colleges, Careers Services, GAP Year organisations, student support services, professional bodies, student travel firms, student finance and lots more (depending on the event). UCAS Education Conventions bring together all the universities and colleges within UCAS so that they can give information and guidance in person to prospective university students who attend. Prospectuses are available from most of the stands at the conventions. Entry into Medicine, Law, Psychology How to fill in your UCAS Form Taking a year out Grants and Loans Many of the conventions also have an extensive seminar programme. Some recent topics include: Meet our representatives across the UK Visit Kent Courses University of Kent Locations Maps and directions Courses Further information In your country In your school or college (UK) Education fairs in the UK Meet Kent representatives International students Informal visits Postgraduate Subject Days General Postgraduate events Applicant
